title: The Sixth Day of Christmas, Boosted
author: VD
content_html:
On the sixth day of Christmas, John Bradley gave to me: a promise he can’t possibly keep.

  • I’ll Be Home for Christmas
  • White Christmas
  • Silent Night
  • Let It Snow
  • Hallelujah
  • All I Want for Christmas
content_text:
On the sixth day of Christmas, John Bradley gave to me: a promise he can’t possibly keep.
I’ll Be Home for Christmas
White Christmas
Silent Night
Let It Snow
Hallelujah
All I Want for Christmas
